profile.headline: Remote-Friendly Software Engineer | Delivering innovative solutions with Replit
profile.summary: Highly motivated and detail-oriented software engineer with a passion for open-source development. Proficient in a range of programming languages and technologies.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at Replit
description: Designed and developed scalable backend infrastructure for the Replit platform.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software products.
Mentored junior engineers and contributed to the growth of the team.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed custom software solutions for clients across various industries.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
